topic.title: FIFO Fill Monitors

body.p: Each SCPB pop port has a FIFO fill monitor that can be directed at one channel FIFO at a time. Fill is reported in 128 byte words. The current fill, the maximum fill since monitor reset, and the minimum fill since monitor reset are all reported. Fill can be calculated by either subtracting the read pointer from the write pointer (which includes any partially written packets), or by subtracting the read pointer from the write pointer corresponding to the newest SOP (which includes only complete packets).
